message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $150?
I understand that $180 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we try $165?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $155?
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still not willing to go below $160. How about we meet in the middle at $157.50?
I'm getting close, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $152.50?
I'm really close to your price, but I'm still not willing to go below $155. How about we meet in the middle at $153.75?
I'm really close to my budget, and I think we're getting close to a deal. Would you be willing to consider a price of $150?
